WorkItem.Description:
* new-alert [ [-eventname] <eventname> ] [ [-variable] <var> | [-variablename] <varname> ] [ [-count] <count>] [ [-message] <msg>] - type <balloon | apptitle | sound | email> [-onceonly] 
 
(returns alert id)
 
* get-alert  [ [-id] alertid ]   (lists active alerts/notification)
 
* remove-alert <alertid>
 
these will be used as a foundation to build rich job handling scripts.
